summary: The Department of Defense's approach to transforming its business operations is on our High Risk List . We have found weaknesses that hurt efficiency and effectiveness and render DOD's operations vulnerable to waste, fraud, and abuse. We examined 3 recent DOD reform efforts, including its work to measure savings from these efforts. DOD reported $37 billion in savings. We found these savings were largely reflected...
title: Defense Reform: DOD Has Made Progress, but Needs to Further Refine and Formalize Its Reform Efforts
